sense.name: (Cause to) assume the topographical features of a previous time.
sense.examples: The land rejuvenated. Engineers rejuvenated the mountainside. The riven rejuvenated itself.

sense.name: (Cause to) become more youthful or assume a fresher appearance or outlook.
sense.examples: The week at the spa rejuvenated her. The contact with his family rejuvenates him. He rejuvenated when he became a grandfather.
